DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate image quality low-dose tomosynthesis system versus comparator . Subjects undergo four-view tomosynthesis examination comparator study device , image assess several radiologist compare detail image two system .
DOC.brief_title: Low Dose Tomosynthesis Compared Traditional Tomosynthesis
DOC.detailed_description: Tomosynthesis relatively new technology acquire mammographic image image acquire several projection angle , give 3d information help radiologists assess image . The aim study see whether new low-dose tomosynthesis system comparable image quality lower x-ray radiation dose comparator .
DOC.criteria: Woman 40 year age Has tomosynthesis examination comparator Has mammographic finding Pregnant , breastfeed believe may pregnant Unable unwilling give inform consent
